FuncDef: This command indicates whether or not the mac-move agent, when enabled usingconfig>service>vpls>mac-moveorconfig>service>epipe>mac-move, will limit the MAC re-learn (move) rate on this SAP.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the agent will monitor the MAC re-learn rate on the SAP, and it will block it when the re-learn rate is exceeded.
Specifies the that this SAP will not be blocked, and another blockable SAP will be blocked instead.
